markdown: Rumor has it that Ina Garten’s [engagement roast chicken](https://food52.com/recipes/80645-engagement-roast-chicken-with-carrot-panzanella) is *so* good, it helped an iconic celebrity couple take the next step. Yep—Emily Blunt [swears](https://www.today.com/food/people/emily-blunt-credits-ina-gartens-engagement-chicken-marriage-rcna3930) it played a role in John Krasinski popping the question. But you don’t need a proposal on the horizon to know that a great meal can work a little magic.
